meanings.definition: To have more dreams or better dreams than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She outdreamed her friend by imagining flying unicorns in her sleep.
meanings.sent2: He always outdreamed his siblings with his vivid nighttime adventures.
meanings.sent3: The cat outdreamed the dog by dreaming of chasing mice in its sleep.
meanings.sent4: Her outdreamed fantasies soared higher than the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The child's outdreamed world was filled with endless possibilities and magic.

meanings.sent1: The artist outdreamed all others with his surreal and imaginative paintings.
meanings.sent2: She outdreamed her classmates with her elaborate dream journal entries.
meanings.sent3: The outdreamed clouds in the sky seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His outdreamed visions painted a picture of a world beyond reality.
meanings.sent5: The outdreamed landscape of his mind was a masterpiece of creativity and wonder.
